tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE survey_answers (
    answer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    questionnaire_id INT,
    answer_text TEXT,
    respondent_name VARCHAR(50),
    answer_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (questionnaire_id) REFERENCES survey_questionnaires(questionnaire_id)
);

CREATE TABLE survey_questionnaires (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  question TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE answers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  questionnaire_id INT,
  answer_text TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (questionnaire_id) REFERENCES survey_questionnaires(id)
)

CREATE TABLE respondents (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE responses (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  respondent_id INT,
  answer_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (respondent_id) REFERENCES respondents(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (answer_id) REFERENCES answers(id)
)
